title: Thea Portfolio Analytics
text:
FOR FIDELITY & WESTCAP EYES ONLY


Introduction and Key Findings

This page provides analytical insights for three funds still in the J-curuve stage of fund life (vintage years 2019, 2021, 2023)
We provide a condensed summary of the NAVcasts™ followed by extensive modeling results and simulations of similar-styled funds
Reliable NAVcast™ estimates were obtained for all three funds
As expected, NAVcast™ values quickly incorporate public market movements and can result in both substantial discounts and premiums to estimates of GP-reported NAVs
Simulations provide further evidence of correctly modeling the generated fund values and data generating parameter value choices



Fund-level Analytics

These estimates use the Fidelity Total Market Index Fund (FSKAX) as the market benchmark and the Fidelity MSCI Information Technology Index ETF as the comparable asset
An explanation of the data matching simulations is within the Extensive Results section below

Conclusions and Next Steps
These results are for relatively young funds in a single and very volatile sector. In some ways these funds are edge cases that push the limits of the model, and we were reassured to have the model generate results that were both statistically reliable and intuitive. Before the model can go into automated production, we need to have a robust method for choosing the market benchmark and comparable asset. These choices sometimes have meaningful effects on model parameters and valuations. While there is probably not a “right” way to do this some choices will be better than others. Having an established process for this will be important. Input data quality control is another important factor. For example, the data we received had a positive cash flow for a capital call on Apr-21, 2023 for the 2019 vintage fund which probably should be a negative value. We are developing a screening tool for flagging suspicious values. We have limited this analysis to weekly valuations. We plan to extend the analysis to include daily valuations using an intra-week extrapolation method. We are in the process of building a user interface that allows for data uploads and on-demand model estimation after completing the quality control process.
